Posts.Content: Three weeks after first taking Arimidex, I developed a rash. It becomes particularly itchy during the night . It starts on my thighs and moves up to my abdomen and back and neck. Arimidex was stopped after another three weeks and it is now two months since it was stoppe but no signs of the itch getting better. Does anybody know how yo make the rash go away ? Shaila
Posts.Title: Itchy rash after taking Arimidex
